context: Blackbaud is a leading provider of cloud-based software for nonprofits, foundations, and educational institutions. In 2025, organizations increasingly seek alternatives due to Blackbaud's complex pricing (Raiser's Edge starts at $5,000 for single user, features from $119/month), steep learning curve, and lack of free trial. The nonprofit software market is competitive with both enterprise-scale and SMB-focused alternatives.

competitors.name: Salesforce Nonprofit Cloud
competitors.notes: Best overall alternative to Blackbaud Enterprise Fundraising CRM. Built on Salesforce platform with enterprise scale, deep configurability, powerful automation, and robust reporting. Supports complex multi-program operations.

competitors.name: Bloomerang
competitors.notes: Top alternative for both Enterprise CRM and Raiser's Edge. Cloud-based donor management with CRM, online donations, email marketing, and reporting. Pricing starts at $125/month for 1000 contacts.

competitors.name: Virtuous CRM+
competitors.notes: Top Raiser's Edge alternative. User-friendly customizable interface. Nonprofits worldwide switching from Blackbaud. Resources like Virtuous Academy for quick onboarding.

competitors.name: Neon CRM
competitors.notes: Third-ranked alternative. Cloud-based nonprofit CRM with event management, volunteer tracking, online store, donor communication, one-click reporting, automated receipts. Starts at $99/month with unlimited users.

competitors.name: DonorPerfect
competitors.notes: Top alternative for Raiser's Edge NXT. Online fundraising software for tracking annual appeals, crowdfunding, gifts, donations, volunteers. Scalable for all nonprofit sizes.

competitors.name: Bonterra
competitors.notes: Umbrella brand combining fundraising, digital engagement, impact management, and grants management. Portfolio includes EveryAction, CyberGrants, Social Solutions, GiveGab. Sophisticated multi-channel engagement tools.

competitors.name: Microsoft Cloud for Nonprofit
competitors.notes: Built on Dynamics 365 and Power Platform. Centralizes donor, volunteer, program data. Strong integration with Microsoft 365, Azure, and Power BI.

competitors.name: Donorbox
competitors.notes: Alternative for online donation management and fundraising.

competitors.name: OneCause
competitors.notes: Fundraising software for events and donor engagement.

competitors.name: Tithe.ly
competitors.notes: Giving platform for churches and nonprofits.

competitors.name: Little Green Light
competitors.notes: Cloud-based donor management for small nonprofits.
